categories: Category:Battles of the Invasion of Naboo

nodes.text: During the Invasion of Naboo, the Trade Federation Droid Army stormed the swamps of Naboo and attacked the Gungan capital of Otoh Gunga. Being stationed on the parameter of the city, Captain Roos Tarpals saw the coming assault and, sounding a warning alarm, warned the population about the approaching battle droids. He coordinated the Gungan evacuation into the swamps of Naboo's surface, from which the Gungans retreated to the sacred place. Otoh Gunga was left abandoned after the attack. After the defeat of the Trade Federation, the Gungans were able to return to their cities.
